summary: This is a very small plugin that ads the four DLC Shrines from Dawnguard and Dragonbon into locations in Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is a small plugin that ads the four shrines from Dawnguard and Dragonborn to locations found in vanilla Skyrim. The shrines are: Shrine of Auriel, Shrine of Mephala, Shrine of Azura and Shrine of Boethiah. This mod requires Dawnguard and Dragonborn to work. Heartfires might be required as Hearthfires.esm was activated when i edited the mod, but the mod uses no content from heartfires.




SPOILER!!! (Shrine locations):
Auriel - found by the tenth emblem on the path to High Hrothgard, together with a shrine to akatosh (It's not very plausible, I know.)
Mephala - as this daedra has no statue in skyrim I placed her shrine in the dunmer cornerclub in windhelm, as she is one of their main deities, and they might be praying in secrecy.
Boethiah - Found at the shrine to Boethiah, east of Windhelm.
Azura- found by the statue of Azura, on the mountain south of Winterhold

I might move the shrines to more plausible locations if anyone has any suggestions, I have plans of maybe adding more shrines to the gray quarter, but it's not going to happen yet.
author: Vaffelmannpingvinen
